attributes.additional_details:
Percy the owl is the mascot for Paradigm YP - a youth project who aim to provide all children and teachers with the tools to learn First Aid.

Percy and his team at Paradigm YP thinks that First Aid should be available to everyone and if all the children in the UK learn it, we could help lower NHS as well as save more lives.

We just received a grant from Starbucks to fund our mission and now just need everyone's get our message to Mr Prime Minister.
